feedbackDescription: Users are finding it challenging to navigate through the assignment submission process. Consider simplifying the interface.
It would be helpful to have a built-in chat feature within study groups to facilitate real-time communication.
I encountered a bug when trying to upload PDF files for assignments. It would fail to upload intermittently.
The platform tends to slow down during peak usage times. Performance optimization is needed.
Could you add more math-related study materials? It would benefit students in STEM fields.
I noticed a potential security vulnerability when logging in. User data should be better protected.
